data.text:
(It's early summer, but there's still some snow left 
in the mountains. The lakes can get terrifyingly cold)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>(It's early summer, but there's still some snow left 
<story>in the mountains. The lakes can get terrifyingly cold)

data.text:
(I can feel the chill. My teeth are chattering. ……but 
that's why there's meaning in enduring. My weakness, 
fragility, all of it will freeze and shatter. And then――)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>(I can feel the chill. My teeth are chattering. ……but 
<story>that's why there's meaning in enduring. My weakness, 
<story>fragility, all of it will freeze and shatter. And then――)

data.text: (Building up a strong heart――!)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed: <story>(Building up a strong heart――!)

data.text:
Fuu-…… ……I need to change my clothes before my body 
gets too cold. If I catch a cold, there would be no point.
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>Fuu-…… ……I need to change my clothes before my body 
<story>gets too cold. If I catch a cold, there would be no point.

data.text: (――……It's been about a week since I've entered these mountains)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed: <story>(――……It's been about a week since I've entered these mountains)

data.text:
(Placing myself in a harsh environment, and 
meditating by the lake, I can feel the effects. 
……It's okay. I can feel myself getting stronger)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>(Placing myself in a harsh environment, and 
<story>meditating by the lake, I can feel the effects. 
<story>……It's okay. I can feel myself getting stronger)

data.text: (For the 『NHK Mile Cup』, my preparations are proceeding――)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed: <story>(For the 『NHK Mile Cup』, my preparations are proceeding――)

data.text:
(At the 『Hanshin Juvenile Fillies』, honestly, 
I could tell that I was severely lacking)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>(At the 『Hanshin Juvenile Fillies』, honestly, 
<story>I could tell that I was severely lacking)

data.text:
(Even though she let 1st place escape her, Kraft still 
placed 3rd. On the other hand, I didn't even place.)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>(Even though she let 1st place escape her, Kraft still 
<story>placed 3rd. On the other hand, I didn't even place.)

data.text:
(But, by the 『Fillies' Review』 I had closed 
to a distance of a head. And at the 『Oka Sho』, 
our difference was a tenth of a second)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>(But, by the 『Fillies' Review』 I had closed 
<story>to a distance of a head. And at the 『Oka Sho』, 
<story>our difference was a tenth of a second)

data.text:
(I don't think there was a big difference between 
our strength. But even then I was still one step, 
just one step short. One thing I was missing)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>(I don't think there was a big difference between 
<story>our strength. But even then I was still one step, 
<story>just one step short. One thing I was missing)

data.text:
……from here on out, rather than the physical, 
this is the place for mental. But that's why…… 
I'll push myself to the limit and train myself……!
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>……from here on out, rather than the physical, 
<story>this is the place for mental. But that's why…… 
<story>I'll push myself to the limit and train myself……!

data.text: Until the 『NHK Mile C』, definitely……!
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed: <story>Until the 『NHK Mile C』, definitely……!

data.text:
――That's right, Trainer. I want my next race to 
be the 『NHK Mile C』, that's what I just said. 
……Please. Let me compete against Rhein Kraft.
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>――That's right, Trainer. I want my next race to 
<story>be the 『NHK Mile C』, that's what I just said. 
<story>……Please. Let me compete against Rhein Kraft.

data.text:
『Hanshin JF』『Fillies' Review』 and 『Oka Sho』…… 
In every race, she pulled ahead of me.
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>『Hanshin JF』『Fillies' Review』 and 『Oka Sho』…… 
<story>In every race, she pulled ahead of me.

data.text:
Kraft is the wall currently stopping me. If I can't overcome 
her here and now, then I won't be able to continue……!
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>Kraft is the wall currently stopping me. If I can't overcome 
<story>her here and now, then I won't be able to continue……!

data.text:
She has something that I don't. To take hold of that…… 
rather than the 『Oaks』 I will choose the 『NHK Mile C』!
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>She has something that I don't. To take hold of that…… 
<story>rather than the 『Oaks』 I will choose the 『NHK Mile C』!

data.text:
And so, everyone spent April training hard……and then, early 
May, the skies were cloudy on the day of the 『NHK Mile Cup』.
data.processed:
<story>And so, everyone spent April training hard……and then, early 
<story>May, the skies were cloudy on the day of the 『NHK Mile Cup』.

data.text:
『Soon, the race will begin here at the Tokyo Race Course. 
It's unfortunate that the sky is cloudy, but the crowd 
is still filled with tremendous excitement!』
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>『Soon, the race will begin here at the Tokyo Race Course. 
<story>It's unfortunate that the sky is cloudy, but the crowd 
<story>is still filled with tremendous excitement!』

data.text:
『That's because, for the Classic class, this is the race to 
decide the "Generation's Fastest". Where runners from the 
triple crown, tiara, and short distance rotations gather――』
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>『That's because, for the Classic class, this is the race to 
<story>decide the "Generation's Fastest". Where runners from the 
<story>triple crown, tiara, and short distance rotations gather――』

data.text:
『To decide who stands at the pinnacle in 
terms of speed. I'm really looking forward 
to just what kind of speed they'll show us!』
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>『To decide who stands at the pinnacle in 
<story>terms of speed. I'm really looking forward 
<story>to just what kind of speed they'll show us!』

data.text:
『Furthermore, this time, the Oka Sho Uma Musume, Rhein Kraft, 
is participating. She's getting quite a bit of attention!』
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>『Furthermore, this time, the Oka Sho Uma Musume, Rhein Kraft, 
<story>is participating. She's getting quite a bit of attention!』

data.text:
『This is the first time in history the Oka 
Sho Uma Musume has participated in the NHK 
Mile C. What kind of run will she show us?』
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>『This is the first time in history the Oka 
<story>Sho Uma Musume has participated in the NHK 
<story>Mile C. What kind of run will she show us?』

data.text:
『Will she win against this group of young competitors, proud of 
their speed, and achieve this unorthodox double crown for the 
first time in history? Now, the NHK Mile C will soon begin!』
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>『Will she win against this group of young competitors, proud of 
<story>their speed, and achieve this unorthodox double crown for the 
<story>first time in history? Now, the NHK Mile C will soon begin!』

data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Fuu-…………

data.text:
――Yes, Trainer-san. 
I'm fine.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>――Yes, Trainer-san. 
<story>I'm fine.

data.text:
For each of the girls participating, I've done a lot 
of investigating and analyzing. No matter what situations 
arise, I think I can stay calm and handle them.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>For each of the girls participating, I've done a lot 
<story>of investigating and analyzing. No matter what situations 
<story>arise, I think I can stay calm and handle them.

data.text:
Get out front at the start, take control of the pace, and 
push through with power. I know how I should be running!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Get out front at the start, take control of the pace, and 
<story>push through with power. I know how I should be running!

data.text: Yeah! I'm off!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Yeah! I'm off!

data.text:
……I'll break through. Carve a path. 
With my legs. With a run of my own.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……I'll break through. Carve a path. 
<story>With my legs. With a run of my own.

data.text:
My dream, my apsirations, my heritage…… 
I'll connect them to the future!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>My dream, my apsirations, my heritage…… 
<story>I'll connect them to the future!
